comment_body: Just the sweetbreads is my fave part

Recommendation- you only mention two names. Something more creative than Mr Stevens and Steve perhaps lol 

Very good story though!
Yep. Murder is wrong, but I don't really feel sorry for Steve.
Just being a typical guy . . . which arguably makes him culpable.
Yeah, I like that too.  Mom had to come back in there somehow.
Oddly enough, neither do I.  Seems he got what he had coming.
